title: JFK: Director's cut; Beyond JFK: the question of the conspiracy (S) (Captioned)
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
description: Starring Kevin Costner, Joe Pesci, Tommy Lee Jones and Gary Oldman, JFK also features an extensive gallery of appearances by acclaimed actors including Ed Asner, Walter Matthau, Jack Lemmon and Donald Sutherland. This release has an additional 17 minutes of footage, providing more excitement, intrigue and insight into Jim Garrison's turbulent investigation of President John F. Kennedy's assassination. "Beyond JFK: the question of conspiracy" is a ninety minute documentary re-examining the issues raised by the film and features interviews with persons involved in the Garrison investigation plus astonishing eyewitness accounts. Includes Jim Garrison's last recorded interview prior to his death.
related_objects: Title; 305454; JFK: Director's cut. Beyond JFK: the question of the conspiracy; Active; 1991
